3.1.hd_quote: Confusion is natural before mutation can take place.
3.1.behavioral_axis: Accepts confusion as natural and waits for life to reveal order without forcing solutions.
3.1.shadow_axis: Tries to control and hammer confusion into order through willpower, creating deeper confusion.
3.1.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

3.2.behavioral_axis: Naturally projects immature, confused energy and gets called out by others who offer to show the way.
3.2.shadow_axis: Accepts guidance from anyone without depth, becoming more confused by people equally lost.
3.2.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

3.3.hd_quote: Trial and error is built into survival.
3.3.behavioral_axis: Experiments through trial and error to discover which mutations are fertile and which are sterile.
3.3.shadow_axis: Denies evolutionary standards perversely, refusing to adapt through the trial-and-error process.
3.3.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

3.4.hd_quote: Innate quality which attracts valued guidance.
3.4.behavioral_axis: Externalizes confusion charismatically, attracting others who provide guidance and count the money.
3.4.shadow_axis: Becomes dependent on external guidance, unable to recognize own capacity to resolve confusion.
3.4.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

3.5.hd_quote: The world sees confusion as an opportunity for victimization.
3.5.behavioral_axis: Holds steady under projections that confusion is bad, maintaining integrity despite pressure to conform.
3.5.shadow_axis: Appeases others who impose order, becoming victimized by those who see confusion as weakness.
3.5.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

3.6.hd_quote: The ultimate maturity to recognize when struggle is futile.
3.6.behavioral_axis: Surrenders to confusion without fighting it, trusting that ordering emerges naturally as a process.
3.6.shadow_axis: Becomes depressed by overwhelming confused energy, refusing engagement unless absolute proof exists.
3.6.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks
